name: Thunder Arrow: Tactics
description:
Join to the "Propeller's Club" and fight against other pilots in virtua air combats using just propeller-based aircrafts.

v0.1.0

This is an alpha version. The final version can be very different from what you see here.

Requirements: 

  • Android tablet or smartphone, with Vulkan or OpenGL ES 3.2
  • Wireless joystick enabled
  • Touch-screen enabled

Follow me on https://twitter.com/BrMgodoy or here on itchio, to be aware about new versions and updates.
